children.summary: Gets the validator that ensures the authorization request is for an allowed host.

content.value: public Task AuthenticateRequestAsync(RequestInformation request, Dictionary<string, object>? additionalAuthenticationContext = null, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Public Function AuthenticateRequestAsync(request As RequestInformation, additionalAuthenticationContext As Dictionary(Of String, Object) = Nothing, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task

parameters.description: Optional. Additional authentication context that may contain extra scopes or other information.
Optional. The cancellation token to cancel the asynchronous operation.

children.remarks: This method supports additional scopes provided either as an or a single string with scopes separated by spaces. The scopes are expected to be provided in the additionalAuthenticationContext dictionary with the key scopes.

exceptions.description: Thrown if the URI is not allowed by the AllowedHostsValidator or if token acquisition fails.

children.summary: Authenticates an HTTP request by acquiring an access token and setting it in the request's Authorization header.

content.value: public Task<string> GetAuthorizationTokenAsync(Uri uri, Dictionary<string, object>? additionalAuthenticationContext = null, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)
Public Function GetAuthorizationTokenAsync(uri As Uri, additionalAuthenticationContext As Dictionary(Of String, Object) = Nothing, cancellationToken As CancellationToken = Nothing) As Task(Of String)

parameters.description: The URI for which the authorization token is required.
Optional. Additional authentication context that may contain extra scopes or other information.
Optional. The cancellation token to cancel the asynchronous operation.

return.description: A task that represents the asynchronous operation, containing the authorization token.

children.remarks: This method supports additional scopes provided either as an or a single string with scopes separated by spaces. The scopes are expected to be provided in the additionalAuthenticationContext dictionary with the key scopes.

exceptions.description: Thrown if the URI is not allowed by the AllowedHostsValidator.

children.summary: Asynchronously gets an authorization token for the specified URI.
